text: Robert Robinson (23 June 1921 – 1975) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Ashington Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Burnley F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Newcastle United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bobby Robinson (footballer, born 1921)
